post.description: This API is used to <b>start multipart file upload</b>. The service will returns the list of presigned urls that will be used to upload the Parts.<br/>Make sure to upload the Parts in-order based on the presigned urls order.The size of each Part should above or equals to 5MB, except the last one.

get.description: This API is used to get the BuildInfo configurations.<br/><br/><b>1. Entitlement Validation</b><br/>Entitlement Validation is utilized in download and update game/application flow.<br/>It will check whether the user is entitled for the game/application or not through Justice Entitlement Service.<br/>If user is entitled, it will process the request, otherwise the request will rejected.<br/><br/>Other detail info: <ul><li><i>Returns</i>: Configuration Info</li></ul>

patch.description: This API is used to update the BuildInfo configurations.<br/>This API support update configuration based on given data. Single request can update single field or multi fields.<br/><br/><b>1. Entitlement Validation</b><br/>Entitlement Validation is utilized in download and update game/application flow.<br/>It will check whether the user is entitled for the game/application or not through Justice Entitlement Service.<br/>If user is entitled, it will process the request, otherwise the request will rejected.<br/><br/>Other detail info: <ul><li><i>Returns</i>: Configuration Info</li></ul>

post.description: This API is used to save detailed diff cache. Only used by differ. Not to be used directly.

put.description: This API is used to mark that the diff caching is complete and diff summary file uploaded to s3. Only used by differ. Not to be used directly.

post.description: This API is used to dispatch diff caching request.

This API is used to bulk dispatch diff caching requests to differ instance.<br/>The processing order will follow the order of the array.<br/>The <b>priority</b> flag means that request will be set as priority inside the queue and always served first even if thereâ€™s existing non-priority request(s) beforehand.<br/><br/>Other detail info: <ul><li>Request is skipped if the source and destination versions is same</li><li>Request is skipped if the source version is not found</li><li>Request is skipped if the destination version is not found</li></ul>

get.description: This API is used to get build manifest of release version of the application. Supply it with source buildId and BuildInfo will output release build and obsolete files list between two version. Only works for builds uploaded with BuildInfo v2<p>Other detail info: <ul><li><i>Returns</i>: build manifest</li></ul>

get.description: This API is used to get version history.<p>Other detail info: <ul><li><i>Returns</i>: version chain from specified build</li></ul>

post.description: This API is used to <b>start resumable multipart file upload</b>.<br/>The service will returns the list of presigned urls that will be used to upload the Parts.<br/>If there's a missing Part in the presigned urls list, it indicates that the Part already uploaded previously, so it can be skipped.<br/>The size of each Part should above or equals to 5MB, except the last Part.

delete.description: This API is used to <b>abort resumable multipart file upload</b>.<br/>The aborted multipart file upload cannot be continued again.

404.description:
ErrorCodeErrorMessage
12142Block with hash [{hash}] not found
12941Multipart uploadId for hash [{hash}] not found

x-errorCodes.12941: Multipart uploadId for hash [{hash}] not found

patch.description: This API is used to <b>commit resumable multipart file upload</b> to signal the upload completion.<br/>If there's a missing Part that not uploaded yet, then the multipart file upload cannot be committed.

404.description:
ErrorCodeErrorMessage

12941Multipart uploadId for hash [{hash}] not found

x-errorCodes.12941: Multipart uploadId for hash [{hash}] not found

post.description: This API is used to <b>commit the Part of multipart upload</b>.<br/>The committed Part will be marked as completed, so in case the multipart file upload retries, it won't be included in the list of unuploaded parts.

BlockDownloadUrls.description: A DTO object for block download urls

urls.description: Map of block download url <uuid, url>

BlockDownloadUrlsRequest.description: A DTO object for creating block download urls

entitlementValidation.description: Entitlement validation status, true means the entitlement validation is activated in download build flow

ConfigurationUpdate.description: A DTO for update the configuration

entitlementValidation.description: Entitlement validation status, true means the entitlement validation is activated in download build flow

DiffCacheObject.description: A DTO object for single diff result

priority.description: set as priority so it always served first inside queue (default: false)

devStackTrace.description: internal server error stack trace in configured environment

parts.description: List of Parts contains presigned url for part upload, make sure to upload the parts in-order

ReleaseNoteDTO.description: A DTO object for release note manifest

baseUrls.description: list of base url for release note file

ReleaseNoteLocalizationDTO.description: A DTO object for release note localization

ReleaseNoteManifest.description: A DTO object for creating/updating release note manifest

RetrieveDiffCacheResponse.description: A DTO object for diff cache response

baseUrls.description: base url for summary file and diff cache files

summaryFile.description: summary file that contains all diff cache result

partSize.description: part size of multipart upload, the service will returns N signed urls based on that size
